Function - say_hello(name)¶

Examples:

say_hello('Steve')

'Hello Steve!'
assert say_hello("Jeremy")=="Hello Jeremy!"

test_eq(say_hello("Steve"),"Hello Steve!")

say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to somebody

Class: HelloSayer¶

class HelloSayer[source]

HelloSayer(to)

Say hello to to using say_hello

o = HelloSayer("Alexis")

o.to

'Alexis'
o.say()

HelloSayer.say[source]

HelloSayer.say()

Do the saying
